long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds a right click menu allowing you to search your highlighted/selected text on any Ebay site. 

Supports all the Ebay sites worldwide! Simply click on the menu icon and select the site you want use for future searches and it will stay set to that site. This includes the following sites and locales: [ ebay.com | ebay | ebay.co.uk | ebay.de | ebay.es | ebay.fr | ebay.it ]
